name: sloccount

variants.name: build_system
variants.description: Build systems supported by the package

description:
SLOCCount is a set of tools for counting physical Source Lines of Code
(SLOC) in a large number of languages of a potentially large set of
programs.

dependencies.name: gmake
dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.

dependencies.name: coreutils
dependencies.description:
The GNU Core Utilities are the basic file, shell and text manipulation
utilities of the GNU operating system. These are the core utilities
which are expected to exist on every operating system.

dependencies.name: flex
dependencies.description: Flex is a tool for generating scanners.
